news.title: U.S. economy shrank 0.3% in the first quarter as Trump policy uncertainty weighed on businesses
news.summary: Gross domestic product was expected to rise at a 0.4% annualized pace in the first quarter, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

news.title: Private payroll growth slowed to 62,000 in April, well below expectations
news.summary: Companies slowed hiring sharply in April as they braced against potential impacts from President Donald Trump's tariffs. Companies are bracing for possible impacts from potential impacts on their businesses from tariffs.

news.title: First Solar stock plunges as CEO says Trump tariffs pose ‘significant economic headwind’
news.summary: First Solar CEO: Trump's tariffs "create a significant economic headwind" for the company. First Solar has plants in India, Malaysia and Vietnam.

news.title: Wall Street is anxious to hear Apple CEO Tim Cook's first public comments on tariffs
news.summary: CEO Tim Cook will discuss how the company is dealing with President Donald Trump's tariffs. The most anticipated part of Apple's Thursday earnings will be Cook's comments on the tariffs.

news.title: Yum Brands revenue misses as Pizza Hut's same-store sales fall 2%
news.summary: Yum Brands, the parent of KFC, Pizza Hut and Taco Bell, said sales rose 12% in the first quarter. Yum Brands: Sales rose 12%.

news.title: Etsy vows to stay ‘nimble’ amid tariff fallout and ‘fluid’ consumer confidence
news.summary: The first quarter of 2025 “played out largely as expected,” Etsy said. “The first Quarter of 2025 played out mostly as expected.”

news.title: Humana’s exit of some ‘unprofitable’ Medicare plans helps fuel a big profit beat
news.summary: Humana affirmed its full-year profit outlook, which can be viewed as a positive in the current uncertain economic environment. But quarterly revenue came up a bit shy, and the earnings outlook for the current quarter was below Wall Street projections.

news.title: Markets are dealing with a new kind of shock. The S&P 500 might not have bottomed yet, says Goldman Sachs
news.summary: Goldman Sachs strategist Vickie Chang is not convinced the S&P 500’s tariff-induced wild days are over yet.

news.title: GDP shrinks for first time in 3 years as Trump tariffs trigger record trade deficit. Tip of the iceberg?
news.summary: U.S. economy contracted in the first quarter of 2025 for the first time in three years. Surge in imports ahead of President Trump’s tariffs and a slowdown in consumer spending.

news.title: Bring on RFK Jr.’s food-dye ban
news.summary: It's not a good idea to raise the price of junk food. Especially if it will raise the cost of food in the first place. That's what happened in the UK.
